verses.name: Genesis 32:15
verses.text: Thirty milch camels with their colts, forty kine, and ten bulls, twenty she asses, and ten foals.

verses.name: Genesis 32:16
verses.text: And he delivered them into the hand of his servants, every drove by themselves; and said unto his servants, Pass over before me, and put a space betwixt drove and drove.

verses.name: Genesis 32:17
verses.text: And he commanded the foremost, saying, When Esau my brother meeteth thee, and asketh thee, saying, Whose art thou? and whither goest thou? and whose are these before thee?
